title: Teaming Up For Kalamazoo Public Schools
caption: Working together with fellow board members, Tianna L. Harrison and Patti Scholler-Barber, to ensure the future of Kalamazoo Public Schools.

title: Kalamazoo Central Maroon Giants Hall of Fame Dinner
caption: Attending with Jermaine Jackson (KPS School Board Trustee) and Von Washington Jr. (Executive Director of Community Relations, Kalamazoo Promise).

title: Taking A Lap While Supporting Girls On The Run®
caption: Encouraging a culture of inclusion, embracing differences, and promoting the physical, emotional and spiritual health with Girls On The Run®.

title: Learning Hub Endorsement
caption:
The new learning hubs will offer students access to WiFi, healthy snacks and meals, enrichment activities and mental health and wellness resources.

title: KPS Family Facebook Group
caption:
The KPS Family Facebook group is a private group that gives our families a place to stay connected while our children attend Kalamazoo Public Schools.

To join the group, click here.
